duties_responsibilities.duty: Evaluate pressure system for potential over pressure scenarios (new & existing)
Design, model, document, and communicate requirements for pressure relief devices and effluent handling systems (includes flares)
Provide relief system input for Process Hazard Analysis (PHA) reviews
Participate in safety and environmental reviews as needed
Work to enhance safety and protection of the environment through project development and audits
Stay abreast of corporate and industry relief practices and standards
Interface with Manufacturing, technical services, and maintenance groups to ensure all changes comply with company and industry relief protection standards and practices
Develop and maintain process simulations for units
Perform process design for development of projects and units that support the long-term strategic goals of the site
Provide process oversight during project detailed design
Participate in investigation of departmental safety and environmental incidents, accidents, near misses and issues in an effective and timely manner

education_certification.credential: Bachelor Degree in Chemical Engineering from accredited university or college.
